actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain territorial provisions in licenses relating to trademarked soft drink products shall not be considered to be in violation of the Federal Trade Commission Act or the Federal antitrust laws.

summary.text: Soft Drink Interbrand Competition Act - Declares that exclusive territorial arrangements made as a part of a licensing agreement for the manufacture, distribution, or sale of a trademarked soft drink product are lawful under the Federal Trade Commission Act and the antitrust laws provided such product is in substantial and effective competition with other products of the same general class.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain territorial provisions in licenses relating to trademarked soft drink products shall not be considered to be in violation of the Federal Trade Commission Act or the Federal antitrust laws.
